metadata.Title: CVE-2012-2401 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Plupload before 1.5.4, as used in wp-includes/js/plupload/ in WordPressbefore 3.3.2 and other products, enables scripting regardless of the domainfrom which the SWF content was loaded, which allows remote attackers tobypass the Same Origin Policy via crafted content.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2401` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 3.3.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 3.3.2+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.2+dfsg-1').
